description.value: Astropath can spend a Fate Point to negate the result of a Psychic Phenomena they rolled, including a result of Perils of the Warp. However, they cannot use the Focus Power action or sustain any Psychic Powers until the start of their next turn.

system.benefit: Astropath can spend a Fate Point to negate the result of a Psychic Phenomena they rolled, including a result of Perils of the Warp. However, they cannot use the Focus Power action or sustain any Psychic Powers until the start of their next turn.

specialAbilities.name: Bound to the Highest Power
